title: Verify user can log into Forms Tool from the Login page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Browser cache is cleared
AND The user has been given permissions to access BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opens the BAM Forms Tool login page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user inputs their username
AND The user inputs their password
AND The user clicks Login
custom_expected:
THEN The user is logged in
AND The Form List page displays on the tab that it set to default in the user’s My Profile

title: Verify user can sign out of Forms Tool
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks Sign Out in the left menu
custom_expected:
THEN The User is logged out
AND The BAM Forms Tool login page displays

title: Verify user can login into Forms Tool using a deep link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Browser cache is cleared
AND The user tries to open a deep link
custom_steps:
WHEN User inputs their username
AND User inputs their password
AND User clicks Login
custom_expected:
THEN User is logged in
AND The deep link opens

title: Verify a form can be searched by Name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form List page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user inputs a search term in the "Search by Name" field
AND The user clicks the "Search" button
custom_expected: THEN Forms with names that include the search term will display

title: Verify a form can be searched by Tag
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form List page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks on the "Search by Tag" field
AND The user selects "sponsorships" and/or "ticketing"
AND The user clicks the "Search" button
custom_expected: THEN Forms with the searched tags display

title: Verify the columns on the Form List page can be set to show/hide
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form List page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks on Form List Settings at the top right
AND The user unchecks a column to display
AND The user checks a column to display
custom_expected:
THEN The unchecked columns will not display on the Form List page
AND The checked columns will display on the Form List page

title: Verify the Columns to Display settings are persisted across browsers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form List page
AND The user unchecks a column to display
AND The user checks a column to display
custom_steps:
WHEN The user signs out
AND The user logs back into BAM Forms Tool in a different browser
custom_expected: THEN The user should see the same columns that was set to display in the previous browser

title: Verify columns can be resized on the Form List page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form List page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks and drags the dividers between the column headers
custom_expected: THEN The width of the column resizes

title: Verify columns can be resized on the Submissions List page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Submissions List page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks and drags the dividers between the column headers
custom_expected: THEN The width of the column resizes

title: Verify columns can be resized on the User List page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the User List page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks and drags the dividers between the column headers
custom_expected: THEN The width of the column resizes

title: Verify columns can be resized on the Templates List page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Templates List page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks and drags the dividers between the column headers
custom_expected: THEN The width of the column resizes

title: Verify columns can be resized on the Approvals page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opens a form that meets all the requirements needed to request approval
AND The user opens the Approvals page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks and drags the dividers between the column headers
custom_expected: THEN The width of the column resizes

title: Verify column sizes are persisted within one browser
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user changed column widths on the Form List page
AND The user changed column widths on the Submissions List page
AND The user changed column widths on the User List page
AND The user changed column widths on Templates List page
AND The user changed column widths on the Approvals page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user signs out
AND The user logs back into BAM Forms Tool in the same browser without clearing cache
AND The user opens the Form List page, Submissions List page, User List page, Templates List page, and Approvals page
custom_expected: THEN The user should see the same columns widths that was set before they signed out

title: Verify if a logged in user tries to access an invalid page, an error page displays
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The user tries to access an invalid page:
- Incorrect path (manually change a word in the URL)
- Invalid id (manually change the form id in the URL)
- On the User List page, click on a user who no longer has an LDAP account
custom_expected: THEN The user should see the Formtool error page (https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/error)

title: Verify if a logged out user tries to access an invalid page, an error page displays
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is not logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The user tries to access an invalid page:
- Incorrect path (manually change a word in the URL)
- Invalid id (manually change the form id in the URL)
- On the User List page, click on a user who no longer has an LDAP account
AND The user logs in
custom_expected: THEN The user should see the Formtool error page (https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/error)

title: Verify if a logged in user tries to access a page they do not have permission to access, an unauthorized error page displays
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps: WHEN The user tries to access a page they don't have permission to access
custom_expected: THEN The user should see the Formtool unauthorized error page (https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/unauthorized)

title: Verify if a logged in user tries to access a page they do not have permission to access, an unauthorized error page displays
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is not logged into BAM Forms Tool
custom_steps:
WHEN The user tries to access a page they don't have permission to access
AND The user logs in
custom_expected: THEN The user should see the Formtool unauthorized error page (https://qa-tools.bam-forms.com/#/unauthorized)

title: Verify user can open a new form page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has the Form List page open
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "New Form" button
custom_expected:
THEN A new form page opens
AND The form status is Editing
AND The Settings, Edit, Approvals, Activity, Submissions, and Summary tabs do not display
AND The Actions and View menus do not display

title: Verify user can input a Form Name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a new form page open
custom_steps: WHEN The user inputs a new form name in the Form Name field
custom_expected: THEN The form name will appear at the top of the form page as the user is typing

title: Verify user can select a Network
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a new form page open
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects a Network in the Network drop down
custom_expected:
THEN The Network drop down closes
AND The selected Network displays as selected in the drop down
AND The Property drop down is enabled
AND The Property drop down contains the available properties for the selected Network

title: Verify user can select a Property
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has the Settings page open
AND The user has selected a Network
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects a Property in the Property drop down
custom_expected:
THEN The Property drop down closes
AND The selected Property displays as selected in the drop down
AND The Time Zone drop down displays the time zone of the selected Property

title: Verify correct time zone is selected automatically for teams not in Eastern Time (observes daylight saving time)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has the Settings page open
AND The user has selected MLB.com (mlb) as the Network
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects a team in the Property drop down that is not in Eastern Time (observes daylight saving time)
- Example: Dodgers (LA)
custom_expected:
THEN The Property drop down closes
AND The selected team displays as selected in the drop down
AND The Time Zone drop down displays the time zone of the selected team
- Example: For Dodgers (LA), the time zone Pacific Time (observes daylight saving time) should be automatically selected

title: Verify a new form can be saved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a new form page open
AND The user has selected a Form Name, Network, and Property
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Save" button
custom_expected:
THEN The message "Saved Successfully." displays
AND The new form is created
AND The new form displays on the Form List page

title: Verify a list of warning messages can be expanded

AND The user changes the element's Label
custom_expected:
THEN The label of the element changes in the edit area of Forms Tool
AND The new label displays on the Preview pages

title: Verify Placeholder text can be added to an element
custom_preconds:

custom_steps:

AND The user inputs placeholder text in the Placeholder field in the right panel
custom_expected:
THEN The placeholder text displays in the element in the edit area of Forms Tool
AND The placeholder text displays on the form's Preview pages

title: Verify Resume Editing link displays in the Actions menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The editor is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The form's status is Waiting for Approval, Approved, Rejected, or Ready to Go Live
custom_steps:
WHEN The editor opens the form
AND The editor hovers over the Actions menu
custom_expected: THEN The Resume Editing link displays in the Actions menu

title: Verify Resume Editing changes the form's status to Editing
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The editor is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The form's status is Waiting for Approval, Approved, Rejected, or Ready to Go Live
custom_steps:
WHEN The editor opens the form
AND The editor hovers over the Actions menu
AND The editor clicks the Resume Editing link
AND The editor clicks on the "Resume Editing" button in the confirmation pop up
custom_expected:
THEN The form's status changes to Editing
AND The form's status change displays on the Activity page

title: Verify Resume Editing will revoke approval requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The editor is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The form's status is Waiting for Approval, Approved, Rejected, or Ready to Go Live
custom_steps:
WHEN The editor opens the form
AND The editor hovers over the Actions menu
AND The editor clicks the Resume Editing link
AND The editor clicks on the "Resume Editing" button in the confirmation pop up
custom_expected: THEN All approval requests are revoked

title: Verify only editors can see the Resume Editing link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user has the canEdit permission checked
AND The user is an owner of the form
custom_steps:
WHEN The user opens the form
AND The user hovers over the Actions menu
custom_expected: THEN The Resume Editing link should not display in the Actions menu

title: Verify a non-clickable background can be applied to a form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user switches on the Enable Background Skin
AND The user selects the Non-Clickable Skin radio button
AND The user sets a Background Skin URL
AND The user sets a Background Color
AND The user sets Background Position (X)
AND The user sets Background Position (Y)
AND The user clicks Save
AND The user sets up the Form page
AND The user sets up the Success page
AND The user sets up the Deactivation page
AND The user previews the Form page, Success page, and Deactivation page
custom_expected:
THEN The Form page displays with the non-clickable background based on the settings set on the Form Settings page
AND The Success page displays with the non-clickable background based on the settings set on the Form Settings page
AND The Deactivation page displays with the non-clickable background based on the settings set on the Form Settings page

title: Verify if a form has Kiosk Mode enabled, then the form will refresh the specified number of seconds after a successful form submission
custom_preconds:
GIVEN On a form's settings page, Kiosk Mode is on
AND The number of "Seconds before refresh" is set
custom_steps:
WHEN The user loads the kiosk mode URL (The kiosk mode URL is the form URL with "#kiosk-mode" appended to the end of the URL.)
AND The user submits the form
AND The specified number of "Seconds before refresh" has passed
custom_expected: THEN The form should refresh

title: Verify if a form has Kiosk Mode enabled, then the form will refresh the specified number of seconds after an unsuccessful form submission
custom_preconds:
GIVEN On a form's settings page, Kiosk Mode is on
AND The number of "Seconds before refresh" is set
AND The form has a Birth Date AOM block
custom_steps:
WHEN The user loads the kiosk mode URL (The kiosk mode URL is the form URL with "#kiosk-mode" appended to the end of the URL.)
AND The user submits the form with an age under 13
AND The specified number of "Seconds before refresh" has passed
custom_expected: THEN The form should refresh

AND The user has a form open with a text input and text area
AND The user opens a preview of this form
custom_steps: WHEN The user submits the form with "<script>alert('HEY!')</script>" in the text input and text area
custom_expected:
THEN The code should not run
AND A pop up should not display

title: Verify success page shows fan entered information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open with various inputs
AND The form's Success page has a Text layout element with markups added
AND The user opens a preview of this form
custom_steps: WHEN The user submits the form with information in the various inputs
custom_expected: THEN The entered information should display on the Success page based on how the Success page was set up in Forms Tool

title: Verify Input Variable drop down includes Submission ID and Submission Date/Time to display on the Success page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Success tab on the Edit page
AND The Success tab has a Text layout element
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks on the Edit Content/Text icon (the pencil icon at the top right of the Text element)
AND The user opens the Insert Variable drop down
custom_expected: THEN "Submission ID" and "Submission Date/Time" should be listed in the Insert Variable drop down

title: Verify when selecting Submission ID from the Input Variable drop down, the corresponding markup should display in the Content Editor field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Success tab on the Edit page
AND The Success tab has a Text layout element
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks on the Edit Content/Text icon (the pencil icon at the top right of the Text element)
AND The user opens the Insert Variable drop down
AND The user selects Submission ID from the Insert Variable drop down
custom_expected:
THEN The following markup should display in the Content Editor text field :

{{"type":"submission-id"}}

title: Verify when selecting Submission Date/Time from the Input Variable drop down, the corresponding markdown should display in the Content Editor field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Success tab on the Edit page
AND The Success tab has a Text layout element
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks on the Edit Content/Text icon (the pencil icon at the top right of the Text element)
AND The user opens the Insert Variable drop down
AND The user selects Submission Date/Time from the Insert Variable drop down
custom_expected:
THEN The following markdown should display in the Content Editor text field :

{{"type":"submission-date-time"}}

title: Verify Submission ID can be displayed on the success page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open with Success page has a Text layout element with the Submission ID markup added
AND The user opens a preview of this form
custom_steps: WHEN The user submits the form
custom_expected:
THEN The Submission ID displays on the Success page
AND The Submission ID matches the Transaction ID on the Submissions page in Forms Tool

title: Verify Submission Date/Time can be displayed on the success page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open with Success page has a Text layout element with the Submission Date/Time markup added
AND The user opens a preview of this form
custom_steps: WHEN The user submits the form
custom_expected: THEN The Submission Date/Time displays on the Success page

title: Verify an external Trigger ID can be added to a form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user is on the Form tab on the Settings page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user switches Confirmation Email on
AND The user selects the "Define external Trigger ID" radio button
AND The user inputs a Trigger ID in the Trigger ID field
AND The user clicks the "Save" button at the bottom of the screen
custom_expected: THEN The message "Saved Successfully." displays

title: Verify a confirmation email is sent for forms with an external Trigger ID
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opened a form with a Confirmation Email setup with an external Trigger ID
custom_steps:
WHEN The user views the form
AND The user submits the form
custom_expected: THEN The user should receive a confirmation email

title: Verify confirmation email can be re-sent from the Submission Details pop up
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opened a form with a Confirmation Email setup
AND The form has submissions
custom_steps:
WHEN The user opens the Submissions page for the form
AND The user clicks on a Transaction ID for one of the submissions
AND The user clicks on the Resend Confirmation Email link
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation email should be re-sent to the email address the fan submitted
AND On the submission's Activity tab, there should be an activity about the confirmation email being re-sent

title: Verify confirmation email is sent for forms with a default Trigger ID
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opened a form with a Confirmation Email setup with a default Trigger ID
AND The form's confirmation email is setup in the Confirmation Email tab
custom_steps:
WHEN The user views the form
AND The user submits the form
custom_expected: THEN The user should receive a confirmation email

title: Verify a preview confirmation email is sent when the user clicks the Confirmation Email link in the View menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opened a form with a Confirmation Email setup with a default Trigger ID
AND The form's confirmation email is setup in the Confirmation Email tab
custom_steps:
WHEN The user opens the View menu in Forms Tool
AND The user clicks the Confirmation Email link
custom_expected: THEN The user should receive a preview confirmation email

title: Verify a preview confirmation email is sent to the Owner when an Owner clicks on the Confirmation Email link on the Approvals page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user opened a form with a Confirmation Email setup with a default Trigger ID
AND The form's confirmation email is setup in the Confirmation Email tab
AND The user is an Owner of the form
custom_steps:
WHEN The user opens the Approvals page
AND The user clicks the Confirmation Email link
custom_expected: THEN The user should receive a preview confirmation email

title: Verify an action displays on the Submission Activity tab after a confirmation email is re-sent
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user has re-sent a confirmation email by clicking the Resend Confirmation Email button on the Submission Record tab
custom_steps: WHEN The user opens the Submission Activity tab
custom_expected:
THEN An action should display in the Submission Activity tab
AND The action should display who re-sent the email
AND The action should display the email address that the confirmation email was sent to

title: Verify the Confirmation Email tab displays on the Edit page in between the Success and Deactivation tabs if Build confirmation email in editor is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged into BAM Forms Tool
AND The user has a form open
AND On the form's Settings page, the Confirmation Email switch on with Build confirmation email in editor selected
AND On the form's Settings page, Create within editor is selected for Deactivation page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks Edit to open the Edit page
custom_expected: THEN The Confirmation Email tab should display in between the Success and Deactivation tabs
